prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Drums, Piano, Bass, but without Reed.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Drums, Piano, and Bass are all featured in this song, but Reed is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Drums, Piano, and Bass, but Reed is not included.

Style 3:
